backend/main.mo: Defines a large Mood variant type with a toText converter and a Gender type with similar utilities inside an actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a UI change to display a bell icon next to circle members, listing affected file, components, and test ID.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for numerous frontend React files detailing layout, routing, onboarding, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the root div and main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, React Query, theming, and the app’s global providers including sound and toast systems.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Footer component rendering attribution text and a dynamic Caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header with branding, theme toggle, journal button, user menu, and improved logout logic clearing cache and redirecting home.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Authenticated app layout with header, bottom nav, footer, journal overlay, and logout-based redirect protection.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Renders a bottom navigation bar with icons, active state highlighting, and an unread notifications badge.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Displays a floating action button for composing a new journal entry when visible.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Provides a button to toggle between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Blocks content until Internet Identity initializes and shows login panel if user is not authenticated.
Shows the login UI with branding, randomized copy, error handling, and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays a generated emotional-energy summary for circle posts inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Lists circle members with profile details, pulse scores, and supports removing members.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form allowing a user to request circle access by entering a share code.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Shows pending join requests with profile info and lets the user accept or decline them.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selection of up to two Safe People, showing recommendations and profile details with add/remove actions.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Displays and edits a user's share code with copy, edit, and save actions using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: A button component that shows an icon with a tooltip wrapper.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible section component with a trigger button and optional default open state.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Shows a daily reminder card prompting a mood check-in with dismiss and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Displays a silent signal entry with author info, mood styling, and timestamp.
Lets users send predefined silent signals to Safe People, with setup prompts if none exist.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: A popover date picker for selecting journal dates, preventing future dates.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Shows journal entries for a selected date with create, update, and delete options when editable.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: A right-side sheet showing journal UI with rules, date picker, and entries panel.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Displays suggested micro-actions based on mood history, with a fallback for insufficient data and a disclaimer section.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood trends and distributions over a selected timeframe and displays insights along with the MicroActionsPanel.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Lets users preview, select, and upload profile avatars with validation and automatic cleanup of preview URLs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates access based on user profile status, handling loading, errors, profile setup, and retries.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides new users through a multi-step onboarding flow to create and save their profile details.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Plays sound effects when new notifications, feed items, join requests, or circle members are detected after initial load.
frontend/src/components/status/AudienceS: UI component for selecting post audience, including specific members and safe people, with dynamic member filtering and selection.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: Tag selection component allowing predefined and custom tags with validation and soft limits.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Searchable mood selector that groups moods by category and lets users choose one with visually coded buttons.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Modal prompting users to add a private note, optionally showing micro‑action suggestions based on mood history.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays an individual status post with mood styling, author info, timestamps, and private‑audience indicators.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Provides predefined context tags and configuration values like soft limits and max custom tag length.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Contains the app’s core promise and boundary copy text.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Holds rotating login screen text snippets and a helper to pick random phrases.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines mood options with labels, emojis, and categories for the mood‑selection UI.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Maps sound cue identifiers to asset paths for UI audio feedback.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Defines a fixed list of system avatar IDs and file paths plus a helper to look up an avatar path by ID.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Provides a React context to control visibility of a floating journal UI with show and hide methods.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Creates a context managing journal overlay open state and reset options, exposing open and close functions.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Implements global sound settings, audio unlocking, and playback functions for notification-related cues.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Builds and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to provide error detection and refetching when actor initialization fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/clear actions, and initialization via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Supplies queries and mutations for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting journal entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Computes the user's recent mood history from feed items filtered by timeframe and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for profiles, avatars, statuses, notifications, and other backend data operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Simple wrapper hook that returns the sound context value.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive light/dark CSS variables plus safe-area padding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the Circle overview with energy, members, requests, join options, and safe people tabs.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Shows a list of circle owners the user belongs to, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Displays ranked closest connections with loading/error handling and detailed explanations.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Provides UI for composing a status with mood, tags, audience selection, and submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Implements the daily check‑in flow with mood, content, audience, guard checks, and posting logic.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Renders the main feed with refresh, reminders, composer, and a list of status or silent signal items.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Routes users to public home, loading screen, or feed based on identity state.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Handles invite-code-based onboarding, login flow, and joining a circle using a stored invite code.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Shows unread and read notifications, supports marking them read, and navigation to linked statuses.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits user profile details, avatar, gender preferences, and pulse score.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page allowing invite-code entry or account creation with feature explanations.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Prompts users to log in or create an account and redirects after successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single status with loading, error, and permission handling, and links back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides utilities to calculate age from a bigint timestamp and convert dates to and from input-friendly formats.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a unique audience list for a post, ensuring the author is always included.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent posts to derive a weekly vibe and generates seeded, non-clinical summary phrases.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates custom context tags, checking length and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a one-time session guard flag for entering daily check‑in mode.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Stores, retrieves, normalizes, and clears invite codes in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Suggests short non‑clinical micro‑actions based on recent mood patterns and context tags.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Computes mood distribution, trends, concern levels, and generates guidance with a built‑in disclaimer.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind class sets and gradients for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Controls once‑per‑day mood reminder visibility using localStorage and local date checks.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Helpers for generating avatar image URLs from profile data, validating avatar files, converting files to bytes, and revoking object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric share code using non‑ambiguous characters.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets a boolean sound‑enabled preference using localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides date/time converters between bigint nanoseconds and JS Date plus helpers for day boundaries, comparisons, and formatting.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters (including hash‑based), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, including a feature to show a bell icon next to circle members for a ping feature.
